description.en:
A series of oneshots which focus on Rohan Kishibe, an eccentric mangaka that appeared in Part 4 of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, Diamond is Unbreakable.  
  
Kishibe Rohan is a mangaka with the ability to read people's memories – a power he refers to as "Heaven's Door". He seeks out the supernatural to see for himself what his mysterious skills are all about, and to bring more realism into his manga.  
  
1. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #16: At a Confessional  
2. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #02: Mutsukabeza  
3. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #05: Village of Millionaires  
4. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #06: Poaching Reef  
5. Extra: Rohan Kishibe Goes to Gucci  
6. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #04: Mochizuki Family's Moon Viewing  
7. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #07: Monday Sunshower  
8. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #09: D - N - A  
9. Thus Spoke Rohan Kishibe - Episode #10: The Run

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/thus-spoke-rohan-kishibe-volume-1/product/7206)

The light is gone. Unable to escape the darkness, Pieta repeats the same day. Every day she walks to school down the same road, through the same rain, then has the same conversation with her friend Danae. Eventually, she finds happiness in the repetition. The days carry on as normal, until one day, her routine chat with Danae takes a different turn: "What?! You can remember the today that happened yesterday too?" Despite their bleak situation, the girls reach towards tomorrow!

title.en: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.ja: 英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With Mr. Hanabusa's Mouth
Hanabusa-kun Is Good with His Mouth - Licking, Sucking, and Slurping...

altTitles.zh-hk: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厲害~又能吸、又能舔

altTitles.zh: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厉害~又能吸、又能舔

description.en:
"Is this your first time? Would you like to borrow my mouth?" Coworkers Yuzuki and Himari are in for an exciting night when he offers to suck, lick, and slurp with this talented mouth. Will he make her cum for the first time? 

(Source: Coolmic)
description.ja: 自分本位な元カレのせいで、「おくち」で気持ちよくされたことのないOL・陽茉梨。やっと別れたのに、飲み会帰りに未練タラタラの元カレと鉢合わせ!?同僚の英くんが助けてくれたけど、「今カレのフリ」でキスされちゃった…！そのまま「俺と付き合います？」とホテルで迫られて――…おくちで愛されるのって、こんなに気持ちいいの…!?そして描き下ろしでは、英くんのおくちではなく×××が活躍っ!?　※この作品は過去、電子書籍「英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…１～６巻」に掲載されました。重複購入にご注意下さい。
description.zh-hk: 陽茉梨是一位OL，在和交往10年的前男友分手後，在公司酒席結束後遇到了糾纏不清的前男友，被年下同事英君給解圍。但對方卻吻了她，甚至當他假男友，就這樣到飯店被逼著說「要和我交往嗎？」然後用他火熱的嘴唇和舌頭親吻了陽茉梨……

description.en: Kisaragi Sumi continuously took care of her parents and grandmother until she turned 60 years old without ever falling in love. One day, after her mother's funeral service, a cat calling himself Rei appeared and granted her wish to bring back her youth. What happens when Sumi gets a second chance in life as a 17-year-old high schooler?!

The revered Swordmaster Hoss sets out to defeat the formidable Shell Dragon! But when people find his cold dead body amidst the remains of a fierce battle, they make a shocking new discovery. Now, with monster hunters discovering new ways to utilize their spoils for more private (?) pleasures, a bizarre sexual hype sweeps through the lands - and Cheong, as innocent as she is, must make her way through this mess. Join Cheong as she embarks on her raunchy new adventure!

title.en: Akuyaku no Goreisoku no Dounika Shitai Nichijou

altTitles.ja: 悪役のご令息のどうにかしたい日常

altTitles.en: The Duke's Beloved Third Son Aims to Escape as a Villain!?

description.en:
The Duke's Beloved Third Son Aims to Escape as a Villain!?

 ♪ A loose and fluffy isekai reincarnation fantasy where the villain's son does his best to avoid ruin ♪

When I was selfish and laughing loudly, I (6 years old) remembered my previous life. Is this the world of RPGs? Moreover, I am the weakest of the three brothers, defeated by the heroes of the future, the so called "villain". I'm so unlucky. It's terrible.
Confused, depressed, and worried, I made up my mind. First of all, let's stop being a villain! Be a good boy, get along with your beloved brothers and servants, and defeat the death flag!

Note: It is tagged "Shounen Ai" "BL" in the novel and the original work BUT the actual romance of this manga doesn't happen until the main character grows up, which will be chapters in the far future. It's more focused on the MC's slow life than the actual romance.
description.ja: 公爵家の愛され三男、目指すは悪役脱出!? 「一迅社ノベルス」の大人気作をコミカライズ！ 悪役のご令息が破滅回避のためにがんばる、ゆるふわ異世界転生ファンタジー♪ 描き下ろし巻末マンガも収録!!　～STORY～　わがまま放題で高笑いしてたとき、僕(6歳)は前世を思い出した。ここはRPGの世界? しかも僕、未来で勇者にやぶれ、三兄弟の中で最弱って言われる存在――いわゆる悪役。ついてない。ひどい。混乱して落ちこんで、悩んで決めた。まずは悪役をやめよう! 良い子になって、大好きなお兄様や使用人たちと仲良くしてフラグを倒そう!!

title.en: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Be a Big Star

description.en: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

altTitles.th: ดรูอิดแห่งสถานีโซล

description.de:
Was wie ein gewöhnlicher Tag begann, wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als eine mysteriöse Katastrophe die Erde heimsucht und Soo Ho Park auf einen anderen Planeten befördert. Mit der Zeit lernt er, sich anzupassen und um sein Überleben in dieser fremden Welt zu kämpfen. Doch eines Tages wird Soo Ho genauso plötzlich wieder auf die Erde zurückgeholt, wie er auf dem neuen Planeten gelandet ist. Schnell erfährt er, dass eine Rückkehr zu seinem vergangenen Leben nicht möglich ist, denn die Erde befindet sich in einem ständigen Kampf mit Monstern, denen es gelungen ist, den Planeten zu infiltrieren. Wie wird Soo Ho gegen die Monster ankämpfen und wird er dieses Mal mit seinen derzeitigen Fähigkeiten überleben können?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3367)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001631)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/the-druid-of-seoul-station/list?title_no=3642)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3586)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)
description.en:
What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth, transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world, but one day, just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet, Suho is pulled back to Earth!

 He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible, as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.

How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth, and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)
description.fr:
Ce qui a commencé comme une journée ordinaire a basculé lorsqu'une catastrophe inconnue a frappé la Terre, transportant Suho Park sur une autre planète. Ce dernier apprend peu à peu à s'adapter et à se battre pour survivre dans ce monde étranger, mais un jour, tout aussi soudainement qu'il a été transporté sur cette nouvelle planète, Suho est miraculeusement ramené sur Terre. Il apprend rapidement que le retour à la vie normale telle qu'il se souvient n'est plus possible, car la Terre est en lutte constante avec des monstres qui ont réussi à s'infiltrer sur la planète. Suho trouvera-t-il un moyen de se battre contre les monstres qui attaquent la Terre, et pourra-t-il survivre avec ses compétences actuelles ?

Suho, kembali ke Bumi setelah seribu tahun menghilang di dunia lain. Namun, dunia yang dulu ditinggali sekarang telah berubah menjadi dunia kebiadaban dengan munculnya monster-monster!

description.ja:
「この世界の支配者は俺だ！」 異世界に迷い込んでから1000年ぶりに地球に帰還した緒形元汰。その間に、地球はモンスターの登場により、完璧な弱肉強食の世界に変わっていた。異世界にて1000もの間、激しい生存競争のすえに、動物の王として降臨した緒形元汰は、ドルイドとして地球征服に乗り出す！

description.ko:
이세계로 사라진 뒤 천 년 만에 지구로 귀환한, 박수호.
그 사이 세상은 몬스터의 등장으로 철저한 약육강식의 세상으로 변해 있었다.
천 년 동안 처절한 생존경쟁으로 살아남은 동물의 왕 드루이드, 세계 정복에 나서다.

이제부터 이 구역의 지배자는 나다.

description.pl:
Park Sooho powrócił na Ziemię po tym, jak przeniósł się do innego świata na tysiąc lat. W tym czasie Ziemia zmieniła się w świat przetrwania najsilniejszych dzięki pojawieniu się potworów. Druid, król zwierząt, któremu udało się przetrwać przez tysiąc lat, wyrusza teraz na podbój świata.

description.ru:
Пак Су Хо, провел тысячу лет с животными и стал друидом.
Тем временем мир превратился в мир жестокости и появились монстры. Друид и царь зверей,
выживший в ожесточенной битве за выживание в течение тысячи лет, отправляется покорять мир.
"Отныне я правитель!"

description.th:
"พัคซูโฮ" กลับมายังโลก หลังจากที่ตกไปอีกโลกนับพันปี ในขณะเดียวกัน โลกที่ซูโฮเคยอาศัยอยู่ได้กลายเป็นสนามรบตั้งแต่มีมอนสเตอร์ปรากฏตัวจากอีกโลกหนึ่ง จากนี้ไป พัคซูโฮ ดรูอิดผู้รอดชีวิตจากป่าอันโหดร้ายและกลายเป็นราชาแห่งสัตว์ ได้เริ่มต้นการต่อสู้เพื่อพิชิตโลก!

description.zh:
千年归来的万物之王！
从现在开始出击征服世界！
朴修浩意外来到异世界后，在千年的生存竞争中成功存活并成为了动物之王。时隔千年又意外重返地球。 在此期间，世界因为怪兽的出现，而彻底变成了弱肉强食的世界。为了继续生存朴修浩开始征服人类世界！

---

description.en:
This apartment complex has a problem with perverted women!

Yoshida is a tiny, frail highschool graduate who became an unwilling manager of an apartment complex when his father, the former manager, injured himself. Unbeknownst to him, this apartment complex houses quite a few women with very... unusual sexual preferences. This becomes a problem when a mysterious entity begins giving "Libido Cloth" to these women - skimpy outfits that give them superpowers and cause them to go on lewd rampages! Will Yoshida be able to stop them?

Yaguchi, who got on board the ship as a cargo ship temporary worker to repay debts. But that was the beginning of a spectacular human experiment. Suddenly, the ship shook greatly and the scene in front of it began to distort with a fierce headache. Before the request to move to grasp the situation, a disastrous scene unimaginable has spread …. Astonishing national overturn suspense where the world's largest urban legend "Philadelphia Project" and the modern world are intertwined!
description.tr: Yaguchi, borçlarını ödemek amacıyla kargo gemisine geçici işçi olarak biner. Ancak bu sadece olağanüstü bir insan deneyinin başlangıcıdır. Gemi, aniden inanılmaz bir şekilde sallanmaya başlar ve Yaguchi’nin önündeki sahne şiddetli bir baş ağrısından dolayı bozulmaya uğrar. Durumu kavrayabilmek için hareket etme isteğinden hemen önce düşünülemez bir felaket meydana gelir… Dünya’nın en büyük şehir efsanesi “Philadelphia Projesi” ile modern yaşamın iç içe olduğu hayret uyandırıcı ulusal bir darbe! ||||
description.zh-hk: 為了還債，矢口求作為貨船的臨時工上了船。但這是一場龐大的人體實驗的開端。船體突如其來的劇烈搖晃，伴隨著劇烈的頭痛眼前的場景開始扭曲。在求掌握局勢之前，難以想象的悽慘景象已經曼延開來。世界上最大的都市傳說“費城實驗”與當代世界交織在一起，驚人的國家顛覆懸疑劇！！

description.en:
One day, Momoko is attacked by Pluie, a demon who's after her keepsake ring left by her mother. Just then, the angel Limone gives Momoko the Sacred Mirror, allowing her to transform into the legendary Love Angel Wedding Peach and drive away demons! And so, Peach and her fellow angels fight to protect the lovers of the world from demons pursuing them for their "wave of love"...!
___
Chapter numbers for the Selene Scans version do not match up, but nothing is missing.

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Do Bad Things with You

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.en: I Returned as an FFF-Class Witch Doctor

description.en:
Ma Jinsung was once a top-ranked player in Arsia Chronicle, but he was brutally killed by his trusted leader. After that, he thought he'd wake up in his room... not 10 years in the past! 

Now, prepared to exact his revenge, he jumps right back into the game. But this time, his job class is voodooist, and he gets bonuses for killing other players. The only downside -  if he dies in the game, he dies in real life.

Can Jinsung get his revenge without causing too much carnage? Don't bet on it...

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

description.en: Geniuses who made a name for themselves in middle school baseball but have been away from baseball accidentally come together at an obscure metropolitan high school. Haruka Kiyomine is a pitcher with an unbeatable arm. His partner, the shrewd catcher, Kei Kaname, is now an amateur due to amnesia!. And then there are the two of them. And those who were defeated and scattered by the two in the past… The story of their high school baseball game is about to begin again!

Hands. It is one of the most complex organs in the human body, with a particularly complex function and structure. Therefore, there is a doctor who specializes in this organ: <Hand Surgeon>. Isshin Tezuka is a hand surgeon at Ohrando Hospital. He has an aloof appearance and is full of mystery, but the only thing that is certain about him is that he is an extremely talented hand surgeon. This is a life story woven by his hands and the many hands he heals. An authentic medical drama for the new era!
description.ja:
その日、病院に運び込まれた男性は、事故で右腕が切断されていた。絶望する男性の息子に救急スタッフが告げる。「再接着手術を行います――」「くっつくんですか…父の右腕が!?」不可能を可能にするのは【手専門の医者】。

【手外科医】手塚一心。

title.en: I Am Reborn as the Sword God

description.en:
I achieved my cozy life of a seventh-grade civil servant by through a lot of hardships and nights of blacking out, so I was looking forward to the weekends where I could relax and have fun, but that night…

Is this Baek Rijin, the main character of the novel ?

When I returned to my senses, I discovered I was in the novel I was reading. Did a seventh-grade civil servant like me became the spoiled young master of the great Jaegal family?! A side character, who has received excessive investments and love since he was young, and now going through a stormy period of his life… The spoiled young master of the Jaegal Family, whom the Blood Demon Cult would annihilate ten years later!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15020)
description.ko:
7급 공무원이었던 내가 대제갈세가의 망나니 대공자가 됐다고?!

죽기 아니면 까무러치기로
스펙을 쌓아 얻은 7급 공무원 생활,
여유를 즐길 주말만 기다리던 내게……

-백리진이오

내게 찾아온 《영웅로》의 주인공, 백리진
아니, 정신을 차려 보니 내가 소설 속에 있었다
어릴 적 가문의 과분한 투자와 사랑을 받았으나
이제는 질풍노도의 시기를 겪는 망나니,
눈 뜨고 주인공에게 기연을 빼앗기는 엑스트라……
그리고 십 년 후, 혈마교에 멸문당할 제갈세가의 대공자로!

지옥 같은 입시 경쟁을 뚫고 나온 프로 노력러,
이제 무림을 준동시킨다!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15020)
description.zh:
意外穿越到自己正在追的武侠小说中？已经手握剧本的我，顺利通关大杀四方，成为一代剑神岂不是易如反掌......

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15020)

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

altTitles.ja: バーテンダー à Paris
バーテンダー　ア　パリ

title.en: Hell Mode: Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market.

Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds.

All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

description.en:
Himeno is a college sophomore who's into other women.
Although she is happy being madly in love with her wonderful girlfriend, Yoru, she is often filled with worries and anxieties because of it...
This is the story of her everyday life.

The descendants of mankind, born in the labyrinth and raised on the milk of monsters, possessed special strength and strong bodies. When they returned to earth, mankind referred to them as dungeon babies. Among them, Kim Jinwoo was born in the deepest labyrinth.

“I never tried to become strong, I just wanted to live.”

From the lowliest excavator to the king of the labyrinth, his life story is now unfolding.

[MU]
description.pt-br: Os descendentes da humanidade que nasceram no labirinto e foram criados com o leite dos monstros possuíam uma força especial e corpos fortes. Quando retornaram à Terra, a humanidade os chamou de bebês da masmorra. Entre eles, Kim Jinwoo nasceu no labirinto mais profundo. 'Eu nunca tentei ficar forte, eu só queria viver.' Desde o mais humilde dos escavadores até o rei do labirinto, sua história de vida agora está se revelando.

description.en: Lee San has lived as a ronin for ten years in the jungles of Nanman and the vast desert of Dunhuang. Now, armed with the Nine Moon Reflection talent and a sword, he set foot on the path of revenge against Kangho. Become an unparalleled hero and make great achievements, drenched in Kangho’s blood. This is the epic tale of the wandering ronin, Lee San
description.ko:
남만의 정글과 돈황의 대사막에서 십 년을 낭인으로 살아온 이산.
이제 구월영의 기연과 도 한 자루를 품고 강호의 복수에 발을 디뎠다.
 
피에 젖은 강호를 독보강호하며 무신으로 일어선 풍운아.
 
낭인도객 흑전랑 이산의 강호 일대기.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%98%A4%ED%95%A9%EC%A7%80%EC%A1%B4/2435)
description.ru:
Ли Сан десять лет был наёмником в джунглях Наммана и великой пустыне Донхвана. И теперь, подружившись с Гу Вольеном и взяв в руки меч, он отправился на великую месть. И вот удачливый путешественник Ли Сан стал непобедимым воином, ибо смочил землю кровью своего врага. Это история получения силы Ли Саном.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%98%A4%ED%95%A9%EC%A7%80%EC%A1%B4/2435)

altTitles.uk: Чи правда, що ви одружуєтесь? [365 днів до весілля]

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka

altTitles.th: แต่งงานที่ว่านี่เรื่องจริงเหรอครับ?

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

description.en: A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

Dam-Ho, the sole survivor of a raid on his village, has a lame leg, the worst possible condition for a martial artist. Nonetheless, he refuses to stop training. Whilst everyone around him tells him he cannot become a martial artist, Dam-Ho refuses to give up on his dream. Will he really be able to become the best martial artist?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AqS6Z96-Wn8)
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%EC%82%B0%EA%B6%8C%EB%A7%88/2469)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12113)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/75613)
description.ja: 一寸先は闇の戦乱時代 村が襲われ、唯一生き残った胆虎（たんこ）。 だが胆虎は片足が不自由で武人としては致命的だった。 不屈の精神を持つ胆虎は周りから何を言われようと諦めずに修練を続けた… 己の拳ひとつで天下を貫いた華山の魔人、これは彼が伝説になるまでの物語。
description.ko: 자신의 마을이 습격받고 유일하게 살아남은 담호, 하지만 담호는 절름발이다. 무인으로서 최악의 조건이지만 담호는 수련을 멈추지 않는다. 주변 사람들로부터 무인이 될 수 없다고 듣지만 끝까지 포기하지 않는 담호, 과연 그는 최고의 무인이 될 수 있을 것인가?
description.ru: После ужасного налета на деревню Дам Хо оказывается единственным выжившим. К сожалению, это событие не прошло без вреда для мальчика. С поврежденной ногой теперь у него нет шансов овладеть каким-либо боевым искусством. Тем не менее это не останавливало его, и он продолжал свои тренировки. Под давлением окружающих, слушая язвительные насмешки, Дан Хо продолжает идти к своей мечте. И кто знает, к чему его это приведет?
description.zh: 不知何时开始，中原魔教四起！在武林即将被魔教颠覆之际。 各路武林正道联手诛灭魔神，终结了动荡的武林.... 因为这场浩劫，天经成为了一个孤儿，并且在腿上留下了残疾 所幸被华山派所救，残疾的天经成为了华山派的一员.... 不被看好被歧视的天经要如何凭借更多的努力和不屈的意志，成为整个武林的至尊强者呢！

altTitles.ja: サキュバスとはじめる真剣交際

description.en: Takeshi is the captain of a club activity that prohibits romance. A devil [succubus] who seduce men appeared under him. How much can he endure in front of a girl who is sexy but far from neat and clean? How far can you go through a pure and uninterrupted love affair?

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
description.it:
:||Tradotto da [Isekai Italy Scan](https://linktr.ee/isitscan/) e [Bullet Club](https://mangadex.org/group/8588/bullet-club)   
  
Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||

altTitles.ja: 水のともだちカッパーマン

description.en: Kawataro, half human, half kappa, lives as a human, because his father, a kappa, wished so. Kawataro travels to find his mother who disappeared when he was young. On his trip, he encounters various youkai.

After dropping out of school, Kwon Daegun is preparing for his qualification exam. While working a part-time job in a convenience store he got into a fight with some thugs. Daegun, who easily overpowered them, is offered a project called “Iljin in Charge/The Bully In Charge” by the Educational Foundation, which has been closely watching him for a long time. He, who accepted the offer after much consideration, enters a high school that belongs to the foundation and defeats the core bullies of this school one by one according to the order of the foundation.

Utori is a young man who hides his special abilities from the world and uses them to discipline bullies. One day, he meets his pursuer, “Juk,” who relentlessly chases him. Despite Juk’s constant threats, Utori cannot die due to his unique ability. Just when Utori thinks he is out of options, a mysterious figure named Daesan appears to save him. Daesan reveals that Utori is not alone and that there are others like him, called “Utori.”
description.ko:
남들과 다른 능력을 숨기며 살아가는 계림
정체를 숨기고 자신의 능력으로 일진들을 참교육 시킨다.
그러던 어느 날, 자신을 죽이기 위해 찾아온 추격자 '죽'을 만나게 되고
죽어도 죽어도 다시 앞에 나타나는 그의 능력으로 죽음을 앞둔 순간
투명 인간 대산이 나타나 계림을 구하고 계림이 자신과 같은
우투리라 이야기하는데...

description.ar: في الشرق العظيم ، تقع قاره عظيمه تسمى رودينوس في يوم ما ، وصل جسم طائر مجهول في المجال الجوي لمقاطعة كوا-توين ، الجسم الطائر المجهول كان معارضا لجو المقاطعة الاعتيادي ، فلم تتقبله المقاطعة ، لكن كان هذا الجسم الطائر مجرد نذير لشيء اكثر صدمة بعيدًا عن البحر الشرقي ، ظهرت فجاه مجموعة من الجزر ، تسمي نفسها دولة اليابان وفقا لهم ، تم نقل أمتهم الى عالم آخر والآن يجدون انفسهم منفصلين عن عالمهم القديم ويجب عليهم البقاء على قيد الحياة في العالم الجديد ، كيف ستتفاعل اليابان مع البلدان الاصليه في العالم الجديد؟ هل سيرحبون بها كصديقه ام كعدو؟ هذه قصه الدوله التي تسمى باليابان التي تغرق في عاصفه فوضويه في العالم
description.en:
In the Great Orient, lies a continent called Rodenius. One day, an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality’s airspace. 
That UFO defied the Principality’s common sense, but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking.  
  
Far to the eastern sea, a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan.
According to them, their nation had been transported to another world.  
  
Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one, how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?  
  
This is a story of the country called Japan as it was engulfed in the chaotic storm of this new world.

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

title.en: The Demon King Who Lost His Job

altTitles.pt-br: O rei demônio que perdeu o emprego

description.en: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
description.pt-br: Ele é o Rei Demônio que sofreu impeachment. Ela é a corajosa heroína que foi demitida por causa de uma expedição fracassada. Presos pelo destino, os dois embarcam em uma aventura para pagar suas dívidas.

description.en:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.

Mitsuki had always dream of breaking out of her shell and finding true friends as she enters high school. However, she suddenly encounters a group of four good-looking guys from the basketball team, guiding her life into an unexpected direction…?  
  
**Note:** Vol. 14 contains 2 "half-time collection" chapters and 3 "extra period" chapters. The last chapter (56) is in 13th volume in original Japanese edition. If your last chapter's vol number cannot match, you cannot get "end" tag next to chapter on MD. Please stop changing the info and confusing the readers.

title.en: Oniisan no Hikkoshi no Katazuke ga Susumanai

altTitles.ja-ro: Oniisan no Hikkoshi no Kataduke ga Susumanai

altTitles.ja: お従兄さんの引っ越しの片づけが進まない

description.en:
Takaho was pleasantly surprised when it was announced that her older cousin, Fujitsugu, would be moving in with them.   
He was her first crush and she was hoping to deepen her bond with him as a little sister.   
Little did she know that her seemingly handsome and perfect cousin was actually…

altTitles.fr: Le régresseur de la famille déchue

description.en:
A life filled with regrets.

Once he realized his faults and decided to lead a new life, it was too late. His family was already gone.

He had borne through each day with pure rage. Finally at the end of his misery, his wish reached the heavens—an unforgiven one.

He goes against fate to raise his sword.
description.ko:
후회로만 가득한 생.

스스로의 잘못을 깨닫고 다시 사람이 되고자 했을 때,
이미 가문은 불타 사라진 뒤였다.

발악 같은 분노로 하루하루 연명하던 삶.
그 절망의 끝에서, 간절한 염원이 하늘에 닿았다.

용서받지 못한 자.
운명을 거슬러 검을 들다.

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

The hero in this story is struggling with depression and feels like he has no purpose in life. One day, he is approached by a 500 year old demon lord who takes an interest in him. The demon lord, who is beautiful and powerful, offers to care about a depressed hero from another world the hero and take care of him.
description.fr: Notre héros se bat contre la dépression et ère sans but dans la vie. Un jour, il rencontre la reine des démons alors vieille de 500 ans. Rapidement, elle va s'intéresser à lui. La reine des démons, belle et forte, lui propose alors de s'occuper de lui. Alerte spoiler : l'un d'eux mourra à la fin de cette histoire...
description.pt-br: O protagonista desta história é um herói que enfrenta uma batalha contra a depressão e está em busca de um propósito na vida. Num certo dia, ele é abordado pela Rainha dos Demônios, uma figura elegante e poderosa, com a impressionante idade de 500 anos, que demonstra interesse por ele. Ela oferece cuidar do protagonista, que pertence a outro mundo, e ajudá-lo em sua luta contra a depressão.

title.en: Gal no Haigo ni Rei ga Iru

altTitles.en: There's a Ghost Behind the Gyaru

altTitles.ja: ギャルの背後に霊がいる

altTitles.en: The ghost is behind the gal

description.en: A girl notices something lurking behind her friend.

altTitles.th: โอตาคุน่องเหล็ก

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

Kyoko (21) and Jiro (23) live together in Tokyo without being married. 
She is a graphist in an advertisement agency, he's starting to be an illustrator. 
We follow them through their love struggles and daily life with friends and family 
in a world where sexual revolution is about to start.
When Gaku lands on the Galapagos Islands, a paradise is the last thing he'll be experiencing. With creatures undergoing horrific evolutions, only one rule still stands--the survival of the fittest!
description.fr: Gaku Hachiue et un groupe d'investigation débarquent sur les "îles Galapagos", réputées être un paradis pour les plantes et les animaux. Mais à la place, ils rencontrent des créatures qui ont évolué d'une manière qui leur est propre. Les seuls à pouvoir survivre dans une situation où la vie est brutalement piétinée, et à la loi du plus fort, sont ceux capable d'évoluer à travers des changements répétés.

altTitles.en: If I Don't Become An Adult

description.ja: 藍が紫への思いに葛藤したり、夜這いしちゃったりする、ゆからん百合本です。甘めです。
